title: Adding a Microsoft email account - Outlook
creator: Shorexen
content: I wanted to add a Microsoft Outlook email to my Thunderbird mobile app. I managed to do it on my computer, but on my phone, I get an error, and all attempts to fix it fail. I've attached a photo of the error below.
